Project: Dummy Variables & One-Hot Encoding

This project covers handling categorical data using dummy variables and one-hot encoding.

Summary

  • Goal: Encode categorical features for ML models
  • Concepts: One-hot, drop-first, multicollinearity
  • Steps: Explore categories → Encode → Train → Evaluate

Notebook

  • Rendered notebook
  • Open in Colab: Launch

Datasets

  • homeprices.csv
  • carprices.csv
